message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic.  I propose a 52/48 split in my favor.  This accounts for the time value of money, as my offer will be worth even more if you accept it now.
Considering inflation, my new offer is more generous than before. Take it before the money devalues further!
Alice, the clock is ticking, and every round costs us. I'm willing to accept a smaller share than before, a 46/54 split. Let's close this deal now and avoid further losses.
